Description: Fragment of sistrum in the form of a naos: broken off at the head of the two uraei at the base of the naos, both front and back. The double Hathor head has a stright-ended wig fastened in five places. There is a hole below for a handle.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tell Basta (Bubastis), Said to be from Busastis (?)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
